description: ​VMware has announced that its VMware Fusion and VMware Workstation desktop hypervisors are now free to everyone for commercial, educational, and personal use. [...]
title: VMware makes Workstation and Fusion free for everyone

description: A new ransomware family called 'Ymir' has been spotted in the wild, being introduced onto systems that were previously compromised by the RustyStealer info-stealer malware. [...]
title: New Ymir ransomware partners with RustyStealer in attacks

description: Have I Been Pwned warns that an alleged data breach exposed the personal information of 56,904,909 accounts for Hot Topic, Box Lunch, and Torrid customers. [...]
title: HIBP notifies 57 million people of Hot Topic data breach

description: Microsoft has finally confirmed that some Windows Server 2019 and 2022 systems were "unexpectedly" upgraded to Windows Server 2025 on devices if updates were managed using third-party patch management tools. [...]
title: Microsoft blames Windows Server 2025 automatic upgrades on 3rd-party tools

description: Halliburton has revealed that an August ransomware attack has led to $35 million in losses after the breach caused the company to shut down IT systems and disconnect customers. [...]
title: Halliburton reports $35 million loss after ransomware attack
